item.description:
@Lord_Jayden wrote:

Maybe you guys aren’t hearing me right… I don’t want a box on the right hand corner. - And I have no idea what Boolean Process is. I’d just like someone to explain how I can get a PlayerCount and my Server Name at the top of my server in English. Thanks…

item.title: Moved: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,221459.0.html
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

He gave you the code…

wait its all wrong…Lemme rewrite it…

[code]public void writePlayers() {

	sendQuest("@red@Welcome To", 15894);
	sendQuest("@red@SERVERNAMEHERE", 15895);
	sendQuest("@red@", 15897);
	sendQuest("@red@"15898);
	sendQuest("@red@", 15899);
	sendQuest("@red@", 15900);
	sendQuest("@gre@Players online: @gre@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 15901);
	sendQuest("", 15896);
	sendQuest("", 15902);
	sendQuest("", 15903);
	sendQuest("", 15904);
	sendQuest("", 15905);
	sendQuest("", 15906);
	setInterfaceWalkable(15892);
}[/code]

Under boolean process put writePlayers();

I like initialize method better, you choose.

Read full topic

‘Players Online: 42’

item.title: Moved: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,221459.0.html
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Jayden Lord Jayden
item.description:
@Lord_Jayden wrote:

Thanks, but I’m actually looking for my Server Name, And how many players are online at the top of my Server, Without a box.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 05, 2007, 07:40:51 PM[/size][hr]EDIT - Tried to use that box method. Nothing happened. Compiling worked fine. Ran the server, worked fine. Tried to log in, ‘No response from Server’ - Had to delete it.
Still, I’m just looking for my Server Name, and How many Players are online at the top of my Server.
I’ve seen it done many times before, Never known how…

Read full topic

item.title: Moved: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,221459.0.html
item.dc:creator: @Judaine Judaine
item.description:
@Judaine wrote:

if what your talkin about is like a box at the top right of your screen that shows that stuff, then put this somewhere in your Client.java:

{ sendQuest("@red@Welcome To", 15894); sendQuest("@red@SERVERNAMEHERE", 15895); sendQuest("@red@", 15897); sendQuest("@red@"15898); sendQuest("@red@", 15899); sendQuest("@red@", 15900); sendQuest("@gre@Players online: @gre@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 15901); sendQuest("", 15896); sendQuest("", 15902); sendQuest("", 15903); sendQuest("", 15904); sendQuest("", 15905); sendQuest("", 15906); setInterfaceWalkable(15892); }
inbetween the ""s just put text that you want or inbetween the "@red@"s put text that you want.

Read full topic
